Container.Name: mysql-workbench
Container.Overview:
MySQL Workbench is a unified visual tool for database architects, developers, and DBAs. MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, backup, and much more.[br] By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:
http://yourhost:3000/?login=true
